casebody.data:
MERCK & CIE, et al., Applicants
v.
WATSON LABORATORIES, INC. No. 16A74. Supreme Court of the United States July 21, 2016.

ORDER

UPON CONSIDERATION of the application of counsel for the applicant,

IT IS ORDERED that the mandate of the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit, case Nos. 2015-2063 and 2015-2064, is hereby stayed pending further order of the undersigned or of the Court. It is further ordered that a response to the application be filed on or before Tuesday, July 26, 2016, by 3 p.m.

/s/ John G. Roberts, Jr.

Chief Justice of the United States
